name: v3.7.0-rc.0
body:
v3.7.0-rc.0

This is a feature release of OpenShift Origin.

## Changes

[Roadmap for the v3.7 release](https://ci.openshift.redhat.com/releases_overview.html#3.7)

[v3.7.0-rc.0](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v3.7.0-rc.0) (2017-10-27) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v3.7.0-alpha.1...v3.7.0-rc.0)


## API

- Images
  - The imagestream `spec.dockerImageRepository` field is now deprecated [\#16181](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16181)
- Routes
  - Support additional field selectors on routes [\#16305](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16305)
- Builds
  - API docs should show the right return value for build instantiate and build instantiatebinary [\#16157](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16157)
  - The experimental extended builds feature has been removed in favor of the existing ability to chain builds with image sources [\#16811](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16811)


### Component updates

- Updated to Kubernetes [v1.7.6-166-ga08f5eeb62 + patches](https://github.com/openshift/kubernetes/commits/c84beff)
  - 45345: Support "fstype" parameter in dynamically provisioned PVs [\#16232](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16232)
  - 45611: remove use of printf semantics for view-last-applied cmd [\#16983](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16983)
  - 47599: Rerun init containers when the pod needs to be restarted [\#16865](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16865)
  - 47806: kubelet: fix inconsistent display of terminated pod IPs by using events instead [\#16464](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16464)
  - 47806: kubelet: fix inconsistent display of terminated pod IPs by using events instead [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - 48033: Refactor and simplify generic printer for unknown objects [\#16892](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16892)
  - 48226: Log get PVC/PV errors in MaxPD predicate only at high verbosity. [\#16329](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16329)
  - 48502: Add a refreshing discovery client [\#16215](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16215)
  - 48524: fix udp service blackhole problem when number of backends changes from 0 to non-0 [\#16328](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16328)
  - 48583: Record 429 and timeout errors to prometheus [\#16266](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16266)
  - 48584: Move event type [\#16865](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16865)
  - 48589: When faild create pod sandbox record event. [\#16865](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16865)
  - 48605: support json output for log backend of advanced audit [\#16128](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16128)
  - 48612: Warn if cluster ID is missing for AWS [\#16331](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16331)
  - 48709: glusterfs: retry without auto_unmount only when it's not supported [\#15199](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15199)
  - 48757: Fix flaky test in reconciler_test [\#16871](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16871)
  - 48940: support fc volume attach and detach [\#15437](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15437)
  - 48970: Recreate pod sandbox when the sandbox does not have an IP address. [\#16865](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16865)
  - 49016: PV controller: resync informers manually [\#16965](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16965)
  - 49025: fix NodePort test on baremetal installs [\#15766](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15766)
  - 49127: Make definite mount timeout for glusterfs volume mount [\#15199](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15199)
  - 49133: add controller permissions to set blockOwnerDeletion [\#16182](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16182)
  - 49142: Slow-start batch pod creation of rs, rc, ds, jobs [\#16111](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16111)
  - 49215: Require Cluster ID for AWS [\#16331](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16331)
  - 49219: Use case-insensitive header keys for --requestheader-group-headers. [\#16186](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16186)
  - 49416: FC volume plugin: remove block device at DetachDisk [\#16236](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16236)
  - 49420: Fix c-m crash while verifying attached volumes [\#15433](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15433)
  - 49475: Fixed glusterfs mount options [\#15199](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15199)
  - 49638: Remove default binding of system:node role to system:nodes group [\#14227](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14227)
  - 49640: Run mount in its own systemd scope [\#15725](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15725)
  - 49899: Update the client cert used by the kubelet on expiry [\#16571](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16571)
  - 50036: Bring volume operation metrics [\#16490](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16490), [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - 50094: apimachinery: remove pre-apigroups import path logic [\#15955](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15955)
  - 50258: Add token cache component [\#14916](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14916)
  - 50258: Add token group adder component [\#14916](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14916)
  - 50258: Add union token authenticator [\#14916](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14916)
  - 50258: Simplify bearer token auth chain, cache successful authentications [\#14916](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14916)
  - 50334: Support iscsi volume attach and detach [\#16299](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16299)
  - 50350: Wait for container cleanup before deletion [\#16865](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16865)
  - 50476:  fix the webhook unit test; the server cert needs to have a valid CN; fix a fuzzer [\#16861](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16861)
  - 50583: Make endpoints controller update based on semantic equality [\#16889](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16889)
  - 50843: FlexVolume: Add ability to control 'SupportsSELinux' during driver's init phase [\#16174](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16174)
  - 51035: Show events when describing service accounts [\#13621](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13621), [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - 51119: Allow audit to log authorization failures [\#16128](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16128)
  - 51148: Enable finalizers independent of GC enablement [\#16105](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16105)
  - 51199: Makes Hostname and Subdomain fields of v1.PodSpec settable when empty and updates the StatefulSet controller to set them when empty [\#16722](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16722)
  - 51448: Add PVCRef to VolumeStats [\#16205](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16205)
  - 51473: Fix cAdvisor prometheus metrics [\#16048](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16048)
  - 51534: update scheduler to return structured errors instead of process exit [\#16015](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16015)
  - 51535: allow disabling the scheduler port [\#16015](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16015)
  - 51553: Expose PVC metrics via kubelet prometheus [\#16205](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16205)
  - 51633: update GC controller to wait until controllers have been initialized [\#16617](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16617)
  - 51636: add reconcile command to kubectl auth [\#16104](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16104)
  - 51638: allow to generate extended methods in client-go [\#16019](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16019)
  - 51644: do not update init containers status if terminated [\#16244](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16244)
  - 51705: Address panic in TestCancelAndReadd [\#16077](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16077)
  - 51727: ensure all unstructured resources [\#16082](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16082)
  - 51728: Enable CRI-O stats from cAdvisor [\#16441](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16441)
  - 51750: output `<none>` for colums not found [\#17023](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/17023)
  - 51782: A policy with 0 rules should return an error [\#16128](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16128)
  - 51796: Fix pod and node names switched around in error message. [\#16392](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16392), [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - 51803: make url parsing in apiserver configurable [\#16110](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16110)
  - 51932: fix format of forbidden messages [\#16110](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16110)
  - 51972: ProducesObject should only update the returned API object resource documentation [\#16157](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16157)
  - 51972: ProducesObject should only update the returned API object resource documentation [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - 52030: Fill in creationtimestamp in audit events [\#16128](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16128)
  - 52073: Fix cross-build [\#16441](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16441)
  - 52092: Fix resource quota controller panic (Drop in 1.8) [\#16241](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16241)
  - 52112: Allow watch cache disablement per type [\#16398](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16398), [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - 52127: Fix deployment timeout reporting [\#16277](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16277)
  - 52168: Fix incorrect status msg in podautoscaler [\#16664](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16664)
  - 52221: Always populate volume status from node [\#16384](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16384)
  - 52297: Use cAdvisor constant for crio imagefs [\#16441](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16441)
  - 52344: Do not log spam image pull backoff [\#16302](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16302)
  - 52440: add --dry-run option -> oadm <drain,cordon,uncordon> [\#16333](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16333)
  - 52503: Get fallback termination msg from docker when using journald log driver [\#16912](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16912)
  - 52515: Clarify predicates name to clean confusing. [\#16778](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16778)
  - 52515: changes to upstream commits to fix unit test errors with 3.7. [\#16778](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16778)
  - 52545: use specified discovery information if possible [\#16722](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16722)
  - 52597: Support flag round tripping [\#16270](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16270)
  - 52602: etcd3 store: retry w/live object on conflict [\#16722](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16722)
  - 52604: Use separate client for node status loop [\#16722](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16722)
  - 52673: default service resolver for webhook admission [\#16861](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16861)
  - 52675: Fix FC WaitForAttach not mounting a volume [\#16483](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16483), [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - 52687: Refactoring and improvements for iSCSI and FC storage plugins [\#16483](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16483), [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - 52691: FC plugin: Return target wwn + lun at GetVolumeName() [\#16483](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16483), [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - 52775: Fix panic in ControllerManager when GCE external loadbalancer healthcheck is nil [\#16722](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16722)
  - 52823: Third party resources should not be part of conformance [\#16722](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16722)
  - 52864: dockershim: fine-tune network-ready handling on sandbox teardown and removal [\#16602](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16602)
  - 52864: dockershim: fine-tune network-ready handling on sandbox teardown and removal [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - 52947: Preserve leading and trailing slashes on proxy subpaths [\#16722](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16722)
  - 53037: Verify client cert before reusing existing bootstrap [\#16571](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16571)
  - 53069: Align imagefs eviction defaults with image gc defaults [\#16565](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16565), [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - 53135: Fixed counting of unbound PVCs towards limit of attached volumes. [\#16718](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16718)
  - 53167: Do not GC exited containers in running pods [\#16896](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16896)
  - 53233: Remove containers from deleted pods once containers have exited [\#16913](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16913)
  - 53299: Correct APIGroup for RoleBindingBuilder Subjects [\#16722](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16722)
  - 53318: create separate transports for liveness and readiness probes [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615),  [\#16633](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16633)
  - 53332: Ignore pods for quota that exceed deletion grace period [\#16722](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16722)
  - 53401: Fix spam of multiattach errors in event logs [\#16681](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16681)
  - 53442: add nested encoder and decoder to admission config [\#16682](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16682)
  - 53446: kubelet: add latency metrics to network plugin manager [\#16696](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16696)
  - 53457: Ignore notFound when deleting firewall [\#16722](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16722)
  - 53464: output empty creationTimestamps as null [\#16665](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16665)
  - 53606: implement ApproximatePodTemplateObject upstream [\#16379](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16379)
  - 53682: Use proper locks when updating desired state [\#16791](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16791)
  - 53720: Optimize random string generator to avoid multiple locks. This is a modified version of the upstream 53720, as SafeEncodeString function does not exist in 3.7. [\#16864](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16864)
  - 53731: Use locks in fake dbus [\#16740](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16740)
  - 53753: Reduce log spam in qos container manager [\#16840](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16840)
  - 53793: User separate client for leader election in scheduler 1.7 PR is https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/53884 [\#16864](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16864)
  - 53823: allow fail close webhook admission [\#16861](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16861)
  - 53831: Fix volume reconciler test flake [\#16871](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16871)
  - 53857: kubelet sync pod throws more detailed events [\#16865](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16865)
  - 53896: decode admission responses into a fresh object [\#16861](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16861)
  - 53916: update .dockercfg data to config.json format [\#16868](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16868)
  - 53989: Remove repeated random string generations in scheduler volume predicate [\#16864](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16864)
  - 54257: Use GetByKey() in typeLister_NonNamespacedGet [\#16986](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16986)
  - 54308: The garbage collector creates too many pods [\#16978](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16978)
  - 54593: Removed containers are not always waiting [\#17042](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/17042)
  - <carry>: Fix to avoid REST API calls at log level 2. [\#15934](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15934)
  - <carry>: allow a filter function on admission registration [\#16639](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16639)
  - <carry>: allow controller context injection to share informers [\#16089](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16089)
  - <carry>: increase timeout in TestCancelAndReadd even more [\#16411](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16411)
  - <carry>: openapi generation for createNamespacedDeploymentConfigRollback duplication problem [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - <carry>: update namespace lifecycle to allow review APIs [\#16603](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16603)
  - <carry>: update namespace lifecycle to allow review APIs [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - <drop>: Adapt etcd testing util to v3.2.1 [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - <drop>: Adapt etcd testing util to v3.2.8 [\#16730](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16730)
  - <drop>: Fix gc test until 1.8 [\#16453](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16453)
  - <drop>: Fix result type in fake clientset generator [\#16100](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16100)
  - <drop>: add debugging to NodePort test [\#15766](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15766)
  - <drop>: aggregate openapi through servers. 1.8 should fix tthis for CRD [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - <drop>: drop in 1.9 rebase.  Shims enough admission webhook to work without modifying api [\#16861](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16861)
  - <drop>: generated updates [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - UPSTREAM: <drop>: handle kube-gen rename [\#16288](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16288)
  - UPSTREAM: <drop>: rename generators to match upstream [\#16288](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16288)
  - revert: bc8249cc6f35fabffff5ccf4e13978ff9a6a2e32: "UPSTREAM: <carry>: allow PV controller recycler template override" [\#16139](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16139)
  - revert: dcb5eef2d8a6d14816d8d1f767f0d0016b84dcdf: "UPSTREAM: <drop>: hack out portworx to avoid double proto registration" [\#15862](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15862)
- Service catalog updated to v0.1.0 [\#17027](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/17027)
  - Squashed 'cmd/service-catalog/go/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/' changes from aa27078754..510060232e (ee4ff3f3c4)
  - catalog: handle change to single catalog binary (de7f4c1890)
- Updated to Docker distribution [v2.6.2-7-g729840c + patches](https://github.com/openshift/distribution/commits/1e2bbed)
  - docker/distribution: 2299: Fix signalling Wait in regulator.enter [\#15694](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15694)
  - docker/distribution: 2382: Don't double add scopes [\#14471](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14471)
  - docker/distribution: 2384: Fallback to GET for manifest [\#14471](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14471)
  - docker/distribution: 2402: Allow manifest specification [\#14471](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14471)
  - docker/distribution: <carry>: Azure dependencies [\#16615](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16615)
  - docker/distribution: <carry>: Revert "disable manifest list registration" [\#16322](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16322)
  - docker/distribution: <carry>: add README.md to docker/distribution/vendor [\#15694](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15694)
  - docker/distribution: <carry>: custom routes/auth [\#15694](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15694)
  - docker/distribution: <carry>: disable manifest list registration [\#16319](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16319)
- Other notable dependency changes
  - bump(github.com/coreos/etcd): v3.2.8
  - fsouza/go-dockerclient: <carry>: support volume mounts in docker build api, RH specific
  - [google/cadvisor#1700](https://github.com/google/cadvisor/pull/1700): Reduce log spam when unable to get network stats
  - [google/cadvisor#1706](https://github.com/google/cadvisor/pull/1706): oomparser: don't get stuck for certain processes
  - [google/cadvisor#1728](https://github.com/google/cadvisor/pull/1728): Expose total_rss when hierarchy is enabled
  - [google/cadvisor#1741](https://github.com/google/cadvisor/pull/1741): add CRI-O handler
  - [google/cadvisor#1766](https://github.com/google/cadvisor/pull/1766): adaptive longOp for du operation
  - [google/cadvisor#1770](https://github.com/google/cadvisor/pull/1770): Monitor diff directory for overlay2
  - [opencontainers/runc#1344](https://github.com/opencontainers/runc/pull/1344): fix cpu.cfs_quota_us changed when systemd daemon-reload using systemd
  - [opencontainers/runc#1378](https://github.com/opencontainers/runc/pull/1378): Expose memory.use_hierarchy in MemoryStats


### Features

- apps: Add prometheus metrics for deployment configs [\#14796](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14796)
- auth: Node admission/authorization [\#14227](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14227)
- auth: Per-client access token expiration [\#14784](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14784)
- auth: Advanced audit as tech preview in origin [\#16128](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16128)
- auth: Report events when service account OAuth is incorrectly configured and clients can't log in [\#13621](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13621)
- cli: Add `--sub-path` opt to `oc set-volume` [\#16459](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16459)
- cri-o: enable build pods to tolerate running on crio while talking to docker [\#16491](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16491)
  - setup crio networking for build containers (57a4f0d070)
- cri-o: Disable hostports when CRI-O is used [\#16463](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16463)
- dns: The DNS subsystem should manage keeping dnsmasq in sync [\#16740](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16740)
- examples: Add an example Helm Tiller template [\#16339](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16339)
- image: Controller for automatic image signature import [\#16293](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16293)
- image: Support manifest list import with linux/amd64 platform [\#16322](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16322)
- metrics: Add Prometheus metrics for TemplateInstance controller [\#16455](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16455)
- metrics: Prometheus alerts for openshift build subsystem [\#16495](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16495)
- network: Support multiple CIDR addresses for the pod SDN [\#14558](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14558)
- network: Semi-automatic egress IP [\#16561](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16561), [\#16659](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16659)
- node: Simplify node bootstraping, allow central configuration of nodes, and enable automatic certificate rotation for nodes [\#16571](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16571)
- node: Allow `openshift start node` to launch the Kubelet directly, instead of running in process [\#16270](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16270)
- registry: Sync images from one image stream to another registry [\#14471](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14471)
- registry: Report the public pull spec for image streams [\#15853](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15853)
- route: Route creation with `oc new-app` [\#16396](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16396)
- route: Use an annotation to provide a route cookie [\#16454](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16454)
- router: Add a simple NGiNX router based template [\#13840](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13840)
- security: Add AllowedFlexVolumes to manage a whitelist of allowed flexvolumes drivers [\#15558](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15558)
- security: Make SCC with less capabilities more restrictive. [\#14825](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14825)
- security: Modify "sudoer" group and "privileged" SCC to seamlessly work together [\#16213](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16213)


### Bugs

- apps: Deployment config stuck in the new state should respect timeoutSeconds [\#17000](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/17000)
- apps: Remove generic deployment config trigger controller [\#14910](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14910)
- auth: Add controller permissions to set blockOwnerDeletion [\#16182](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16182)
- auth: Add short TTL cache to token authentication [\#14916](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14916)
- auth: Add the --rolebinding-name option to rolebinding commands [\#14868](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14868)
- auth: Initialize the server from Kube namespaced roles and bindings [\#16517](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16517)
- auth: Switch to using the upstream RBAC reconcile command  [\#16104](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16104)
- auth: Update RoleBindingRestriction admission to handle RBAC [\#16163](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16163)

- web: Environment From Fix Drag & Order Display [\#2238](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/2238)
- web: Preselect current project in 'Select from Project' [\#2361](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/2361)
- web: Handle displaying parameters when secrets are not available. [\#2355](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/2355)
- web: Use correct HTTP status from failed DataService.list [\#2360](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/2360)
- web: Do not allow updating to plans that have been removed [\#2369](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/2369)
- web: Bug 1506153 - Use query param serviceExternalName [\#2375](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/2375)
- web: Added 'no projects and cant create' empty state to process-template, deploy-image, and from-file [\#2296](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/2296)
- web: Adopt renamed service external name properties [\#2347](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/2347)
- web: Only transition vertical nav if project bar exists [\#2381](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/2381)

name: v3.6.1
body:
This is a patch release of OpenShift Origin.

## Changes


[v3.6.1](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v3.6.1) (2017-10-25) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v3.6.0...v3.6.1)

### Component updates

- Updates to Kubernetes
  - 45352: Pod (Anti)affinity shouldn't be respected across namespaces. [\#16016](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16016)
  - 45743: partial pick of 45743 to fix config groupversion defaults [\#16976](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16976)
  - 46236: Support sandbox images from private registries [\#15880](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15880)
  - 47731: Use endpoints informer for the endpoint controller. [\#16575](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16575)
  - 47788: Get rid of 30s ResyncPeriod in endpoint controller. [\#16575](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16575)
  - 49724: skip WaitForAttachAndMount for terminated pods in syncPod [\#15534](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15534)
  - 49992: Correctly handle empty watch event cache [\#15616](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15616)
  - 50258: Add token cache component [\#15662](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15662)
  - 50258: Add token group adder component [\#15662](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15662)
  - 50258: Add union token authenticator [\#15662](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15662)
  - 50258: Simplify bearer token auth chain, cache successful authentications [\#15662](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15662)
  - 50583: Make endpoints controller update based on semantic equality [\#16890](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16890)
  - 50934: Skip non-update endpoint updates [\#15889](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15889)
  - 51144: Fix unready endpoints bug introduced in #50934 [\#15889](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15889)
  - 53753: Reduce log spam in qos container manager [\#16841](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16841)


### Bugs

- Skip goversioninfo when it is not installed [\#15550](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15550)
- Add back origin-sdn-ovs [\#15542](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15542)
- print typed podlist for correct serialization [\#15519](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15519)
- make the router integration tests run as part of test-end-to-end [\#15778](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15778)
- Properly handle errors in policy listing [\#15762](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15762)
- Image policy is resolving images on replica sets by default [\#15867](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15867)
- Mark subjectaccessreview/resourceaccessreview as root-scoped [\#15714](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15714)
- Disable RBAC create commands [\#15618](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15618)
- extended: Skip test instead of failing [\#16126](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16126)
- Add short ttl cache to token authenticator on success [\#15662](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15662)
- make `oc adm create-bootstrap-project-template` compatible w 1.5 cluster [\#16207](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16207)
- Disable TestImageStreamImportDockerHub integration test to unblock the queue [\#16336](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16336)
- Retry image stream updates when pruning images [\#16138](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16138)
- Updating docker --build-arg test due to docker code change [\#16541](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/16541)


## Release SHA256 Checksums

```
922afb7a5642040ea7a6b780cd68eb1d15533b6376b503351a4c38a452338d11  ./openshift-origin-client-tools-v3.6.1-008f2d5-linux-64bit.tar.gz
47d0167e0b496b3a64249e40a91513af998fba7d4ba725454e74a8203024ebd8  ./openshift-origin-server-v3.6.1-008f2d5-linux-64bit.tar.gz
b7ecd27a0e3821868255898ef0ab47dfe0e5e371da6a58b0cbadd687e8dccca0  ./openshift-origin-client-tools-v3.6.1-008f2d5-mac.zip
2a970aec5709f572faa02e877ea33d68e23407e2ec6e39ddc3683077814f6031  ./openshift-origin-client-tools-v3.6.1-008f2d5-windows.zip
62a71b1d94abbf34936a021e56881db981634dcfed83bd8ab4052d19a31fd0d4  ./CHECKSUM
```

name: v3.7.0-alpha.1
body:
This is a feature release towards OpenShift Origin v3.7.0. It is based on Kubernetes 1.7.

## Changes

[Roadmap for the v3.7 release](https://ci.openshift.redhat.com/releases_overview.html#3.7)

[v3.7.0-alpha.1](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v3.7.0-alpha.1) (2017-08-30) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v3.6.0...v3.7.0-alpha.1)


## API Changes

- Upgraded to Kubernetes 1.7 [\#15234](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15234)
  - Please see the [Kubernetes release notes](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#v170) for a description of important API changes
- Improved documentation of the `Route` backend `weight` field [\#15309](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15309)
- `/oapi/v1/namenspaces/{namespace}/generatedeploymentconfigs` has been removed [\#15585](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15585)
- Add public pull spec field to image stream status [\#15643](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15643)
- Improve documentation of the `SecurityContextConstraint` `priority` field [\#15425](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15425)
- `SubjectAccessReview` and `ResourceAccessReview` were marked as namespace-scoped incorrectly in the new API groups [\#15704](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15704)
- Template instantiation will now wait for the object to be ready if it has the `template.alpha.openshift.io/wait-for-ready` annotation set to `true` [\#15402](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15402)
- OpenShift RBAC API objects are now backed by Kubernetes RBAC [\#15021](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15021)
  - The existing OpenShift RBAC APIs will remain, but are implemented on top of Kubernetes RBAC APIs
  - New code should use the Kubernetes RBAC APIs in preference
- The default value of `DeploymentConfig` `spec.revisionHistoryLimit` in apps/v1 is now 10 [\#15642](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15642)
- The `spec.requester` field on `TemplateInstance` now is consistent with other API fields that convey user information [\#15719](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15719)
- The `status.publicDockerImageRepository` field on `ImageStream` reports a pull spec that can be used outside of the cluster to access images [\#15643](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15643)

The [API documentation in `api`](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/master/api/docs) is now auto-generated from our public OpenAPI spec and contains more information on individual objects, which is reflected in the [OpenShift API documentation](https://docs.openshift.org/latest/rest_api/index.html) [\#15788](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15788).


### Component updates

- Updated to Kubernetes [v1.7.0-43-g695f48a16f + patches](https://github.com/openshift/kubernetes/commits/d2e5420)
  - [#00000](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/00000): allow nil openapispec
  - [#00000](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/00000): disambiguate operation names for legacy discovery
  - [#00000](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/00000): make AsVersionedObjects default cleanly
  - [#36774](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/36774): allow auth proxy to set groups and extra
  - [#37380](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/37380): Improve error reporting in Ceph RBD provisioner
  - [#38818](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/38818): Add sequential allocator for device names in AWS
  - [#38925](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/38925): Fix nil pointer issue when making mounts for container
  - [#39732](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/39732): Fix issue #34242: Attach/detach should recover from a crash
  - [#39751](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/39751): Changed default scsi controller type
  - [#39752](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/39752): Fix panic in vSphere cloud provider
  - [#39754](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/39754): Fix fsGroup to vSphere
  - [#39757](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/39757): Fix space in volumePath in vSphere
  - [#39998](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/39998): Cinder volume attacher: use instanceID instead of NodeID when verifying attachment
  - [#40080](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/40080): Fix resttest Update action when AllowUnconditionalUpdate is false
  - [#40301](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/40301): present request header cert CA
  - [#40423](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/40423): Support for v1/v2/autoprobe openstack cinder blockstorage
  - [#40693](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/40693): fix for vSphere DeleteVolume
  - [#40903](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/40903): Set docker opt separator correctly for SELinux options
  - [#40935](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/40935): Plumb subresource through subjectaccessreview
  - [#41043](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41043): allow setting replace patchStrategy for structs
  - [#41196](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41196): Fix for Premature iSCSI logout
  - [#41217](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41217): Fix wrong VM name is retrieved by the vSphere Cloud Provider
  - [#41226](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41226): Fix for detach volume when node is not present/ powered off
  - [#41329](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41329): stop senseless negotiation
  - [#41436](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41436): Fix bug in status manager TerminatePod
  - [#41455](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41455): Fix AWS device allocator to only use valid device names
  - [#41498](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41498): cinder: Add support for the KVM virtio-scsi driver
  - [#41634](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41634): Handle error event type
  - [#41658](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41658): Fix cronjob controller panic on status update failure
  - [#41758](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41758): Updated key.pm and cert.pm to remove error in setting up localhostCert pool
  - [#41814](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41814): add client-ca to configmap in kube-public
  - [#41939](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41939): Add an AEAD encrypting transformer for storing secrets encrypted at rest.
  - [#42033](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42033): fix TODO: find and add active pods for dswp
  - [#42275](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42275): discovery restmapping should always prefer /v1
  - [#42337](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42337): Plumb cipher/tls version serving options
  - [#42421](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42421): proxy not providing user info should cause error
  - [#42491](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42491): make the system:authenticated group adder smarter
  - [#42622](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42622): Preserve custom etcd prefix compatibility for etcd3
  - [#42672](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42672): use separate scheme to serve the kube-aggregator
  - [#42801](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42801): add local option to APIService
  - [#42835](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42835): remove legacy insecure port options from genericapiserver
  - [#42886](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42886): allow fallthrough handling from go-restful routes
  - [#42896](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42896): require codecfactory
  - [#42900](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42900): rewire aggregation handling chain to be normal
  - [#42911](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42911): combine kube-apiserver and kube-aggregator
  - [#42959](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42959): Delete host exec pods faster
  - [#42973](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/42973): Fix selinux support in vsphere
  - [#43003](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43003): separate discovery from the apiserver
  - [#43076](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43076): allow combining API servers
  - [#43141](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43141): Create controller to auto register TPRs with the aggregator
  - [#43144](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43144): start informers as a post-start-hook
  - [#43149](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43149): break kube-apiserver start into stages
  - [#43170](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43170): Add ability to customize fed namespace for e2e
  - [#43226](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43226): don't start controllers against unhealthy master
  - [#43289](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43289): Attach/detach controller: fix potential race in constructor
  - [#43301](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43301): add APIService conditions
  - [#43375](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43375): Set permission for volume subPaths
  - [#43377](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43377): only log stacks on server errors
  - [#43383](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43383): proxy to IP instead of name, but still use host verification
  - [#43396](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43396): iSCSI CHAP support
  - [#43575](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43575): util/iptables: check for and use new iptables-restore 'wait' argument
  - [#43762](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43762): refactor getPidsForProcess and change error handling
  - [#43878](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43878): Delete EmptyDir volume directly instead of renaming the directory
  - [#43922](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43922): prevent corrupted spdy stream after hijacking connection
  - [#43945](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43945): Remove 'beta' from default storage class annotation
  - [#43982](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/43982): Fix deletion of Gluster, Ceph and Quobyte volumes
  - [#44058](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44058): Make background garbage collection cascading
  - [#44066](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44066): Improve federation e2e test setup
  - [#44068](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44068): Use Docker API Version instead of docker version
  - [#44068](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44068): Use Docker API Version instead of docker version (fixup)
  - [#44072](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44072): Cleanup e2e framework for federation
  - [#44073](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44073): Optionally retrieve fed e2e cluster config from secrets
  - [#44082](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44082): use AvailabilityZone instead of Availability
  - [#44113](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44113): vendor: Update elazarl/goproxy to fix e2e test with go1.8
  - [#44115](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44115): scheduler should not log an error when no fit
  - [#44221](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44221): validateClusterInfo: use clientcmdapi.NewCluster()
  - [#44295](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44295): Azure disk: dealing with missing disk probe
  - [#44399](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44399): add deregistration for paths
  - [#44406](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44406): CRI: Stop following container log when container exited.
  - [#44408](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44408): aggregator controller changes only
  - [#44439](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44439): controller: fix saturation check in Deployments
  - [#44452](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44452): Implement LRU for AWS device allocator
  - [#44462](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44462): 44489: fix selfLink for cluster-scoped resources
  - [#44466](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44466): use our own serve mux that directs how we want
  - [#44566](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44566): WaitForCacheSync before running attachdetach controller
  - [#44570](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44570): Explicit namespace from kubeconfig should override in-cluster config
  - [#44579](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44579): make certs used in roundtripper_test same as those used in proxy_test
  - [#44583](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44583): bump bazel build to go1.8.1 and remove invalid unit tests
  - [#44625](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44625): Retry secret reference addition on conflict
  - [#44639](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44639): Set fed apiserver to bind to 8443 instead of 443
  - [#44730](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44730): Check for terminating Pod prior to launching successor in StatefulSet
  - [#44746](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44746): support for PodPreset in get command
  - [#44760](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44760): Fix issue #44757: Flaky Test_AttachDetachControllerRecovery
  - [#44781](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44781): Ensure desired state of world populator runs before volume reconstructor
  - [#44784](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44784): Handle vendored names in OpenAPI gen
  - [#44798](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44798): Cinder: Automatically Generate Zone if Availability in Storage Class is not Configured
  - [#44837](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44837): Fix Content-Type error of apis
  - [#44859](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44859): e2e: handle nil ReplicaSet in checkDeploymentRevision
  - [#44861](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44861): NotRegisteredErr for known kinds not registered in target GV
  - [#44895](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44895): util/iptables: grab iptables locks if iptables-restore doesn't support --wait
  - [#44898](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44898): while calculating pod's cpu limits, need to count in init-container
  - [#44939](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44939): don't HandleError on container start failure
  - [#44962](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44962): Remove misleading error from CronJob controller when it can't find parent
  - [#44970](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/44970): CRI: Fix StopContainer timeout
  - [#45049](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45049): Log an EBS vol's instance when attaching fails because VolumeInUse
  - [#45085](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45085): kube-apiserver: check upgrade header to detect upgrade connections
  - [#45100](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45100): node-controller: deflake TestUpdateNodeWithMultiplePods
  - [#45105](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45105): taint-controller-tests: double 'a bit of time' to avoid flakes
  - [#45171](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45171): Use groupName comment for listers/informers
  - [#45235](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45235): remove bearer token from headers after we consume it
  - [#45238](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45238): expose kubelet authentication and authorization builders
  - [#45247](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45247): Promote apiregistration from v1alpha1 to v1beta1
  - [#45247](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45247): generated: Promote apiregistration from v1alpha1 to v1beta1
  - [#45286](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45286): When pods are terminated we should detach the volume
  - [#45294](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45294): Fix protobuf generator for aliases to repeated types
  - [#45304](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45304): increase the QPS for namespace controller
  - [#45349](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45349): Fix daemonsets to have correct tolerations for TaintNodeNotReady and TaintNodeUnreachable.
  - [#45370](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45370): refactor names for the apiserver handling chain
  - [#45403](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45403): apiserver: injectable default watch cache size
  - [#45413](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45413): Extend timeouts in timed_workers_test
  - [#45427](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45427): 45897: GC controller improvements
  - [#45432](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45432): use apiservice.status to break apart controller and handling concerns
  - [#45496](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45496): fix pleg relist time
  - [#45505](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45505): expose the controller initializers
  - [#45515](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45515): Ignore openrc group
  - [#45601](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45601): util/iptables: fix cross-build failures due to syscall.Flock()
  - [#45623](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45623): Don't attempt to make and chmod subPath if it already exists
  - [#45637](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45637): --api-version on explain is not deprecated
  - [#45661](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45661): orphan when kubectl delete --cascade=false
  - [#45685](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45685): fix quota resync
  - [#45741](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45741): Fix discovery version for autoscaling to be v1
  - [#45747](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45747): OwnerReferencesPermissionEnforcement ignores pods/status
  - [#45826](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45826): prevent pods/status from touching ownerreferences
  - [#45835](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45835): client-gen: honor groupName overrides in customArgs
  - [#45864](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45864): Fix unit tests for autoregister_controller.go reliable
  - [#45894](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45894): Export BaseControllerRefManager
  - [#45933](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45933): Use informers in scheduler / token controller
  - [#45933](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45933): Use informers in scheduler / token controller (part 2, fixing tests)
  - [#45940](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45940): apiserver: no Status in body for http 204
  - [#45977](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/45977): kuberuntime: report StartedAt regardless of container states
  - [#46020](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/46020): Enable customization of federation image
  - [#46034](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/46034): Event aggregation: include latest event message in aggregate event
  - [#46036](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/46036): retry clientCA post start hook on transient failures
  - [#46037](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/46037): NS controller: don't stop deleting GVRs on error
  - [#46042](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/46042): ResourceQuota admission control injects registry
  - [#46042](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/46042): ResourceQuota admission control injects registry (federation)
  - [#46112](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/46112): apimachinery: move unversioned registration to metav1
  - [#46121](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/46121): Fix kuberuntime GetPods
  - [#46127](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/46127): Return MethodNotSupported when accessing unwatcheable resource with ?watch=true

### Features


- auth: Switch to Kubernetes RBAC and have existing OpenShift APIs migrate automatically [\#15364](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15364), [\#15654](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15654), [\#15021](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15021), [\#15936](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15936)
- build: Builds should be able to reference image stream tags and images directly [\#15156](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15156)
- build: Use init containers to pull down build inputs [\#15248](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15248)
- cli: Enable CLI plugins in oc [\#15717](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15717)
- deploy: Set default for DeploymentConfigSpec.RevisionHistoryLimit in apps/v1 to 10 [\#15642](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15642)
- image: Report the public URL of the registry in image streams [\#15643](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15643)
- metrics: Extend prometheus template with alertmanager and message-buffer [\#15078](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15078)
- registry: Replace legacy client in Docker Registry with external clientset [\#15624](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15624)
- registry: Add `-prune` option to dockerregistry [\#14585](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14585)
- server: Enable Kube 1.7 node bootstrap logic [\#15037](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15037)
- server: Use configmap election by default [\#15414](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15414)
- server: Fully support the Kubernetes API aggregator in OpenShift and start separating out pieces of the OpenShift API server [\#15344](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15344), [\#15430](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15430), [\#15564](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15564), [\#15613](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15613)
- template: Detect when template instances have been created [\#15402](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15402)
- template: Run the template service broker as a standalone extension [\#15672](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15672), [\#15677](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15677), [\#15761](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15761)
- test: Run integration tests in parallel [\#15605](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15605)
- web: Improve YAML editor validation and feedback [\#1798](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1798)
- web: Init Container Display & Link [\#1819](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1819)

- web: Adding Deploy Image and Import YAML / JSON functionality to catalog [\#1893](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1893)
- web: More robust handling of large project lists [\#1956](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1956)
- web: Add notification-drawer to show curated list of events to user [\#1326](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1326)
- web: Show provision status of service instances on the overview page. [\#1961](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1961)


### Bugs

- api: Update description of the Priority field on security context constraints [\#15425](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15425)
- build: Allow secrets with "." characters to be used in builds [\#15946](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15946)
- build: Truncate rev.Git.Message on the first line [\#15514](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15514)
- cli: Allow `oadm top pod` and `oadm top node` to default to the correct secured Heapster options on OpenShift [\#15764](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15764)
- cli: CronJobs should be part of the 'all' alias [\#15382](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15382)
- cli: Fix `oc cp` command name [\#15130](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15130)
- cli: Print resource kind when `oc get all` outputs multiple resources of the same type [\#12058](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12058)
- cli: Properly escaping the arguments supplied to rsync -e [\#15589](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15589)
- cli: Some Kubernetes resources were not being properly created from templates by `oc new-app` [\#15787](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15787)
- cli: `oc policy can-i --list` output is not parser friendly [\#15125](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15125)
- cli: `oc rsync` command fails if oc command has space in path [\#15195](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15195)
- cluster: `cluster up` should allow all appropriate docker registry CIDRs [\#15161](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15161)
- cluster: Mount /dev in system container (#15668) [\#15693](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15693)
- deploy: Fix minReadySeconds for DC [\#14954](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14954)
- hack: Move to using OWNERS for tracking reviewers [\#15454](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15454)
- image: Determine protocol just once when the image pruner runes [\#14914](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14914)
- image: Switch to generated clientsets in image controllers [\#15985](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15985)
- image: Use privileged loopback instead of raw registries [\#15773](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15773)
- metrics: Restore cAdvisor prometheus metrics [\#15389](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15389)
- network: Only build pkg/sdn/plugin on Ninux [\#15838](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15838)
- network: Restore Unidler [\#15383](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15383)
- registry: Reenable logstash formatter [\#15423](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15423)
- router: Add validations to Egress router script [\#15249](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15249)
- security: Move CapabilityAll from k8s types and rename it to AllowAllCapabilities [\#15135](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15135)
- security: Update list of allowed runAsUser types in the error message [\#15529](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15529)
- server: Ensure server PostStartHook always succeeds, or die [\#15881](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15881)
- server: Print `/healthz` results to logs on startup failures [\#15659](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15659)
- server: Print better error messages for resources that have multiple API groups [\#15721](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15721)
- storage: Make the recycler pod template changeable [\#15958](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15958)
- test: Add basic cluster loading tests to the test suite [\#13379](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13379)
- test: Cleanup integration tests for use with etcd3 and parallelism [\#15554](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15554)
- test: Improvements to NetworkPolicy tests [\#12991](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12991)
- web: Improve monitoring page collapsed rows [\#1812](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1812)
- web: Update table label filter to reuse data-toolbar data-toolbar-filter and extend on top of table Fixes https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/issues/1824 [\#1836](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1836)
- web: Include word-break class to prevent breakage at mobile widths Fixes https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/issues/1784 [\#1791](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1791)
- web: Use rollback subresource for rolling back deployment config [\#1807](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1807)
- web: Improving display of tech-preview label [\#1810](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1810)
- web: Route table tweaks [\#1818](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1818)
- web: Avoid runtime error when sample pipeline template unset [\#1825](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1825)
- web: Use `apps` API group for deployments [\#1813](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1813)
- web: Bug 1470976 - Support number input on iOS [\#1847](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1847)
- web: Create reusable edit-environment-variables component [\#1821](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1821)

- web: Remove margin that causes errant spacing when build icon and message not shown [\#1827](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1827)

- web: Add a Safari Pinned Tab Icon [\#1909](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1909)
- web: Bug 1479289 - Don't show env validation errors until blur [\#1918](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1918)

- web: Add bindings list to resource pages [\#1912](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1912)
- web: Fix runtime error clicking deploy image dialog close button [\#1938](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1938)
- web: Add canI checks for route custom hosts [\#1935](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1935)
- web: Prefill service labels when creating route [\#1940](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1940)

- web: Changed label to Bindings from Application Bindings [\#1943](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1943)

name: v3.6.0
body:
This is the public release of OpenShift Origin v3.6.0.

## Changes

[Roadmap for the v3.6 release](https://ci.openshift.redhat.com/releases_overview.html#3.6)

[v3.6.0](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v3.6.0) (2017-07-30) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v3.6.0-rc.0...v3.6.0)

See the earlier release notes for other features implemented in this release:

* [v3.6.0-rc.0](https://github.com/openshift/origin/releases/v3.6.0-rc.0)
* [v3.6.0-alpha.2](https://github.com/openshift/origin/releases/v3.6.0-alpha.2)
* [v3.6.0-alpha.1](https://github.com/openshift/origin/releases/v3.6.0-alpha.1)
* [v3.6.0-alpha.0](https://github.com/openshift/origin/releases/v3.6.0-alpha.0)

### Component updates

- Updates to Kubernetes
  - 42038: Add backup-volfile-servers to mount option [\#15396](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15396)
  - 44756: Don't call spew unless we're logging [\#15520](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15520)
  - 48613: proxy/userspace: honor listen IP address as host IP if given [\#15174](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15174)
  - 48709: glusterfs: retry without auto_unmount only when it's not supported [\#15396](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15396)
  - 48813: maxinflight handle should let panicrecovery handler call NewLogged [\#15306](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15306)
  - 48884: Do not mutate pods on update [\#15190](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15190)
  - 48940: support fc volume attach and detach [\#15407](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15407)
  - 48960: No warning event for DNSSearchForming [\#15350](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15350)
  - 49111: Fix findmnt parsing in containerized kubelet [\#15372](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15372)
  - 49120: Modify podpreset lister to use correct namespace [\#15318](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15318)
  - 49127: Make definite mount timeout for glusterfs volume mount [\#15396](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15396)
  - 49230: use informers for quota calculation [\#15357](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15357)
  - 49353: Use specified ServerName in aggregator TLS validation [\#15388](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15388)
  - 49444: Do not spin forever if kubectl drain races with other removal [\#15436](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15436)
  - 49475: Fixed glusterfs mount options [\#15396](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15396)
  - 49688: Don't block watch cache Get/List on unready [\#15515](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15515)
  - Also expose gRPC metrics in kube storage [\#15517](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15517)
  - Carry a patch for reporting 429 metrics [\#15485](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15485)
  - Double the global timeout if performing a global list [\#15505](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15505)

### Features

#### Record the last snippet of build logs into the build API result

In many cases, the last few lines of the build log contain an accurate reason for a failing build. This adds a new field `logSnippet` to the build status and populates it with the last few lines of build logs when the build is marked as failed. This field is purely informational and may not be a complete representation of the final logs.

- Grab a snippet of build logs for failing builds [\#15181](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15181)

### Bugs

- build: Retry build push failures on a larger set of errors [\#15406](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15406)
- build: Only set the build timestamps the first time to avoid duplicate writes [\#15487](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15487)
- cli: Remove use of policy API from CLI [\#15196](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15196)
- cluster: Remove `oc cluster up` dependency on oc binary [\#15471](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15471)
- images: Fix panic when POSTing an image to the server [\#15541](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15541)
- rbac: Handle cleanup of individual authz objects in sync [\#15223](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15223)
- rbac: Update bootstrappolicy/dead addDeadClusterRole to include systemOnly annotation [\#15320](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15320)
- rbac: Reconcile controller roles at startup [\#15354](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15354)
- rbac: Update quota controller's role for Kube authorizer [\#15348](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15348)
- route: Fix panic when user sets edge TLS termination on a route [\#15550](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15550)
- router: Unconditionally remove proxy headers to prevent httpoxy [\#15146](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15146)
- router: Add an ENV to control ipv6 behavior in the router [\#15351](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15351)
- server: Set mutation limit proportional to read limit by default [\#15206](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15206)
- server: Make the master endpoint lease ttl configurable [\#15214](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15214)
- server: Run separate informers for api and controllers [\#15217](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15217)
- server: Register aggregator resources into scheme prior to starting any components [\#15226](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15226)
- server: Unable to authenticate to the controller process using the remote authorizer [\#15458](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15458)
- server: Add gRPC metrics for the API server's connection to etcd [\#15517](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15517)
- server: Make controller client rate limits proportional to the overall limit [\#15479](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15479)


## Release SHA256 Checksums

```
ecb0f52560ac766331052a0052b1de646011247f637c15063f4d74432e1ce389  ./openshift-origin-client-tools-v3.6.0-c4dd4cf-linux-64bit.tar.gz
c9565850257fd758585118c4b5e1be42ddcf133026c02adee2695191690f022e  ./openshift-origin-server-v3.6.0-c4dd4cf-linux-64bit.tar.gz
320dd318b4b094fea9aadee9473173054d1f11b97895b94315fe2f095f08b652  ./CHECKSUM
6ade4ce9b300b1a9ed4ccfa49f3476a0721c71b78e7dd43ca58f4752b29ab5f1  ./openshift-origin-client-tools-v3.6.0-c4dd4cf-mac.zip
6a45e7fe115dd4c8675ba06e8d958da6819b84a876ea6eb1c085a92b741e43f7  ./openshift-origin-client-tools-v3.6.0-c4dd4cf-windows.zip
```

name: v3.6.0-rc.0
body:
This is the first release candidate for OpenShift 3.6.

## Backwards Compatibility

- Security Context Constraints migrated from older versions of OpenShift that have a null allowed `volumes` array will now default to `["none"]`
  - This will prevent future migration to PodSecurityPolicy from being ambiguous 
  - [\#14625](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14625)
- Deployment Configs no longer allow leading or trailing spaces on images 
  - Kubernetes 1.7 will tighten this validation and this will prevent future migrations from being necessary
  - [\#14744](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14744)
- Users may now create routes with empty `spec.tls.destinationCACertificate` fields
  - To preserve backwards compatibility, when the route is retrieved from the `/oapi/v1/routes/*` endpoint it will have a synthetic certificate injected. Retrieving the route from the new `/apis/route.openshift.io/v1` endpoint will show the new empty value.
  - [\#14818](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14818)
- When creating builds via the new `/apis/build.openshift.io/v1` endpoint pruning will be automatically defaulted
  - Builds created via the old API are unaffected. Callers may set the limit high to avoid pruning
  - [\#14845](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14845)

## Changes

[Roadmap for the v3.6 release](https://ci.openshift.redhat.com/releases_overview.html#3.6)

[v3.6.0-rc.0](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v3.6.0-rc.0) (2017-07-13) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v3.6.0-alpha.2...v3.6.0-rc.0)


## API

- The autoscaling v2alpha1 API - new in Kubernetes 1.6 - is disabled by default [\#15058](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15058)
- Image stream tags will now return labels from the parent image stream
  - Sending an update to the tag with empty labels will not cause an error [\#15098](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15098)

### Component updates

- Updated to Kubernetes [v1.6.1-1-g5115d708d7 + patches](https://github.com/openshift/kubernetes/commits/fff65cf)
  - Add the API aggregation code as a backport to 3.6 from Kubernetes 1.7
    - 43003: Separate discovery from the apiserver [\#14513](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14513)
    - 44399: Add deregistration for aggregator paths [\#14513](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14513)
    - 44408: Aggregator controller changes only [\#14513](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14513)
    - 44466: Use our own serve mux that directs how we want [\#14513](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14513)
    - 45247: Promote apiregistration from v1alpha1 to v1beta1 [\#14676](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14676)
    - 45247: generated: Promote apiregistration from v1alpha1 to v1beta1 [\#14676](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14676)
    - 45370: refactor names for the apiserver handling chain [\#14513](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14513)
    - 45432: Use apiservice.status to break apart controller and handling concerns [\#14513](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14513)
    - 46112: apimachinery: move unversioned registration to metav1 [\#14593](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14593)
    - 46440: Fix api server handler routing (move CRD behind TPR) [\#14513](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14513)
    - 46440: Fix api server handler routing (move CRD behind TPR) [\#14847](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14847)
    - 46800: Separate group and version priority [\#14676](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14676)
    - 47060: Fix etcd storage location for CRs [\#14499](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14499)
    - 47347: Actually check for a live discovery endpoint before aggregating (part 2) [\#14881](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14881)
    - 47347: Actually check for a live discovery endpoint before aggregating [\#14595](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14595)
    - 47347: Actually check for a live discovery endpoint before aggregating [\#15022](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15022)
  - Add secret at rest encryption backport from Kubernetes 1.7
    - 46460: Add configuration for encryption providers [\#14798](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14798)
    - 46916: Add AES-CBC and Secretbox encryption [\#14517](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14517)
    - 47537: Fix typo in secretbox transformer prefix [\#14748](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14748)
  - Fixes:
    - 41758: Updated key.pm and cert.pm to remove error in setting up localhostCert pool [\#14847](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14847)
    - 42835: Remove legacy insecure port options from genericapiserver [\#14513](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14513)
    - 43878: Delete EmptyDir volume directly instead of renaming the directory [\#14549](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14549)
    - 43982: Fix deletion of Gluster, Ceph and Quobyte volumes [\#14667](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14667)
    - 44058: Make background garbage collection cascading [\#14907](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14907)
    - 44115: Scheduler should not log an error when no fit [\#14714](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14714)
    - 44746: Support for PodPreset in get command [\#15148](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/15148)
    - 44784: Handle vendored names in OpenAPI gen [\#14993](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14993)
    - 44898: While calculating pod's cpu limits, need to count in init-container [\#14605](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14605)
    - 44962: Remove misleading error from CronJob controller when it can't find parent [\#14899](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14899)
    - 45049: Log an EBS vol's instance when attaching fails because VolumeInUse [\#14844](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14844)
    - 45085: kube-apiserver: check upgrade header to detect upgrade connections [\#14676](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14676)
    - 45349: Fix daemonsets to have correct tolerations for TaintNodeNotReady and TaintNodeUnreachable. [\#14653](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14653)
    - 45637: --api-version on explain is not deprecated [\#14872](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14872)
    - 45661: orphan when kubectl delete --cascade=false [\#14189](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14189)
    - 45864: Fix unit tests for autoregister_controller.go reliable [\#14519](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14519)
    - 46034: Event aggregation: include latest event message in aggregate event [\#14793](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14793)
    - 46036: Retry clientCA post start hook on transient failures [\#14474](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14474)
    - 46121: Fix kuberuntime GetPods [\#14290](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14290)
    - 46771: Allow persistent-volume-binder to List Nodes/Zones Available in the Cluster [\#14899](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14899)
    - 46796: Bump namespace controller to 10 workers [\#14806](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14806)
    - 46852: Lookup no --no-headers flag safely in PrinterForCommand function [\#14472](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14472)
    - 46968: bkpPortal should be initialized beforehand [\#14478](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14478)
    - 46974: Avoid * in filenames [\#14477](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14477)
    - 47003: Fix sorting of aggregate errors for golang 1.7. [\#14495](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14495)

### Features

#### Support API aggregation in OpenShift

API aggregation is a key Kubernetes feature that will make it easier to extend Kubernetes clusters. The 3.6 release enables aggregation as tech preview and includes the Kubernetes 1.7 APIs. Its primary purpose in 3.6 is to support the service catalog.

[\#14513](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14513)

#### Add `httpd` images and quickstart

The `httpd` image makes it easy to serve content to users, proxy, or extend with custom support for Apache modules. This image is added to the default image streams along with a quickstart template.

[\#14660](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14660)

#### Enable schema2 by default for the integrated registry

Now that a significant fraction of all users have access to Docker 1.10, enable schema2 support in the registry by default. This will allow Docker 1.10+ engines to push images using the new schema and sets the stage for future improvements in images.

[\#13428](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13428)

#### Deploy service catalog via `oc cluster up`

The `--service-catalog` flag on `oc cluster up` will deploy the new service catalog and configure the instance
with support for the template broker and the new service catalog UI. This feature is tech preview in OpenShift 3.6.

[\#14630](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14630)

#### Kubernetes objects can request image resolution

Kubernetes objects like `Deployments` and `StatefulSets` can now add an alpha annotation to request image stream resolution from any `image` field in their pod specs. If an image stream tag with matching name and tag exist, the value of the image will be replaced with the latest tag in that stream.  Use `oc set image-lookup` to configure the flag.

[\#14795](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14795)

#### Builds now support the `valueFrom` field to inject dynamic values into environment or labels

Builds, like pods, can use the `valueFrom` field on each label or environment variable to leverage data from the parent build. This allows some limited dynamic properties to be set into each build result.

[\#14749](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/14749)
