name: v1.5.0-rc.0
body:
This is the first release candidate for OpenShift Origin v1.5.

## Changes

[Roadmap for the v1.5.0 release](https://ci.openshift.redhat.com/releases_overview.html#3.5)

[v1.5.0-rc.0](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v1.5.0-rc.0) (2017-03-09) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v1.5.0-alpha.3...v1.5.0-rc.0)


## API

- Routes
  - Change "." to "-" in generated hostnames for routes [\#12976](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12976)


### Component updates

  - 37093: Endpoints with TolerateUnready annotation should list Pods in state terminating [\#13134](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13134)
  - 38746: recognize eu-west-2 region [\#13056](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13056)
  - 38818: Add sequential allocator for device names in AWS [\#13131](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13131)
  - 38855: Fix variable shadowing in exponential backoff when deleting volumes [\#13084](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13084)
  - 38909: Add path exist check in getPodVolumePathListFromDisk [\#13058](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13058)
  - 39825: Make PDBs represent percentage in StatefulSet [\#13143](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13143)
  - 40301: present request header cert CA [\#13145](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13145)
  - 40497: Make HandleError prevent hot-loops [\#13088](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13088)
  - 40553: Adjust global log limit to 1ms [\#13088](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13088)
  - 40625: controller: old pods should block deployment completeness [\#13133](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13133)
  - 40903: Set docker opt separator correctly for SELinux options [\#13141](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13141)
  - 40935: Plumb subresource through subjectaccessreview [\#13086](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13086)
  - 41196: Fix for Premature iSCSI logout [\#12990](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12990)
  - 41366: Change default reconciler sync period to 1 minute [\#13132](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13132)
  - 41455: Fix AWS device allocator to only use valid device names [\#13131](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13131)
  - 41864: Allow 'kubectl drain --force' to remove orphaned pods [\#13123](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13123)
  - 42097: Enqueue controllers after minreadyseconds when all pods are ready [\#13140](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13140)
  - 42178: stop spamming logs on restart of server [\#13126](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13126)
  - 42294: fix rsListerSynced and podListerSynced for DeploymentController [\#13173](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13173)
  - 42337: Plumb cipher/tls version serving options [\#13198](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13198)
  - 40301: present request header cert CA [\#13145](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13145)
  - 40903: Set docker opt separator correctly for SELinux options [\#13141](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13141)


### Bugs

- Ensure RPMs are only build from clean git trees [\#13000](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13000)
- Add missing newlines in oc tag [\#12948](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12948)
- Origin image was creating a file at /usr/local/bin with imagebuilder [\#13009](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13009)
- Generated changes [\#13015](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13015)
- Backported redistributable logic to Origin specfile [\#12969](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12969)
- Removed line breaks in glog messages [\#12962](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12962)
- Only report no running pods once [\#13022](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13022)
- Install ceph-common pkg on origin to support rbd provisioning [\#13060](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13060)
- Add PodSecurityPolicyReview client [\#13045](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13045)
- Bug 1425706 - protect from nil tlsConfig. [\#13073](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13073)
- Prevent build updates from reverting the build phase [\#13075](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13075)
- Bug 1422376: Fix resolving ImageStreamImage latest tag [\#13090](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13090)
- tito: generate man pages [\#13078](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13078)
- Don't overwrite /usr/local/bin with a file [\#13092](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13092)
- update guest profile with new arp tuning missed in https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13034 [\#13103](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13103)
- Verify manifest with remote layers [\#13099](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13099)
- Use DefaultImagePrefix instead of hardcoded 'openshift/origin' for network diagnostic image. [\#13062](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13062)
- backup and remove keys during migration [\#13118](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13118)
- Update the reconciler sync period in master_config_test [\#13132](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13132)
- Necessary origin updates [\#13145](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13145)
- provider recorder to attach detach controller [\#13150](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13150)
- Use posttrans for docker-excluder (#1404193) [\#13148](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13148)
- Change logging deployer image name from 'logging-deployment' to 'logging-deployer' [\#13165](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13165)
- Add stateful sets permissions to disruption controller [\#13199](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13199)
- Output VXLAN multicast flow in sorted order [\#13200](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13200)
- cluster up: warn on error parsing Docker version [\#13204](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13204)
- No failure reason displayed when build failed using invalid contextDir [\#13206](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13206)
- Work around docker race condition when running build post commit hooks. [\#13196](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13196)
- make ciphers/tls version configurable [\#13198](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13198)
- sdn: make /var/lib/cni persistent to ensure IPAM allocations stick around across node restart [\#13236](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13236)
- Fix cookies for reencrypt routes with InsecureEdgeTerminationPolicy "Allow" [\#13250](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13250)
- Allow control over TLS version and ciphers for docker-registry [\#13260](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13260)
- Fix of BUG 1405440 [\#13273](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13273)
- CGO_ENABLED prevents build cache reuse [\#13325](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13325)
- Add addExtension helper [\#1195](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1195)
- Fix duplicates in a repeater error for missing child services [\#1269](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1269)

## Release SHA256 Checksums

```
f8e1b6da0fe766a203f9cc454608eaa17eadf64da623466f1d8e1c39e2639997  openshift-origin-client-tools-v1.5.0-rc.0-49a4a7a-linux-32bit.tar.gz
1796f5131d253591c4649ee316b0f6d7a0b48b70010c56b0c0017e081475d284  openshift-origin-client-tools-v1.5.0-rc.0-49a4a7a-linux-64bit.tar.gz
60c8c174a6078382cd347dd75f8a4d362c19d5b2c9cc0e21baf6f86a6a56b6f3  openshift-origin-client-tools-v1.5.0-rc.0-49a4a7a-mac.zip
5d257629dc09ebd6e674ac7cb719ef423ec2d6ae6c237e251c8fa68160102ec5  openshift-origin-client-tools-v1.5.0-rc.0-49a4a7a-windows.zip
5c3475fa31d278efbb6a3f350eefd15d0ce2cb938043d11ac3c673250d9b39ab  openshift-origin-server-v1.5.0-rc.0-49a4a7a-linux-64bit.tar.gz
```

name: v1.5.0-alpha.3
body:
This is a development release of OpenShift Origin towards v1.5.0.

## Backwards Compatibility
- The `--credentials` flag is now removed from `oadm router` and `oadm registry` [#10830](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/10830)
  - service accounts are the preferred way to set secrets
- The `groups` field on the `User` object has been deprecated [#12870](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12870)
  - Instead, create a `Group` object and reference the user by name.

## Changes

[v1.5.0-alpha.3](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v1.5.0-alpha.3) (2017-02-19) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v1.5.0-alpha.2...v1.5.0-alpha.3)

## API
- templates: Allow namespace specification via parameter in templates [#12918](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12918)
  - If you specify a parameter replacement in the namespace field of a template object, it will be preserved:
    
    ```
    kind: Template
    apiVersion: v1
    parameters:
    - name: NAMESPACE
    objects:
    - kind: Service
      metadata:
        namespace: foo # ignored
    - kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
      metadata:
        namespace: "${NAMESPACE}" # will be set to the value of NAMESPACE
    ```
  - Static values for namespace will continue to be ignored to prevent breaking old templates that included those fields

### Component updates
- Patches on top of Kubernetes v1.5.2
  - 35436: Add a package for handling version numbers (including non-semvers) [#12448](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12448)
  - 37228: kubelet: storage: teardown terminated pod volumes [#12669](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12669)
  - 37846: error in setNodeStatus func should not abort node status update [#12570](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12570)
  - 37986: Add `clusterid`, an optional parameter to storageclass. [#12556](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12556)
  - 38378: glusterfs: properly check gidMin and gidMax values from SC individually [#12556](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12556)
  - 38527: Fail kubelet if runtime is unresponsive for 30 seconds [#12776](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12776)
  - 38579: Let admin configure the volume type and parameters for gluster DP volumes [#12556](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12556)
  - 39831: Check if error is Status in result.Stream() [#12610](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12610)
  - 39842: Remove duplicate calls to DescribeInstance during volume operations [#12740](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12740)
  - 39844: fix bug not using volumetype config in create volume [#12556](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12556)
  - 39998: Cinder volume attacher: use instanceID instead of NodeID when verifying attachment [#12955](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12955)
  - 40023: Allow setting copyright header file for generated completions [#12613](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12613)
  - 40763: reduce log noise when aws cannot find public-ip4 metadata [#12760](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12760)
  - 40859: PV binding: send an event when there are no PVs to bind [#12796](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12796)
  - 41043: allow setting replace patchStrategy for structs [#12731](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12731)
  - 41147: Add debug logging to eviction manager [#12876](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12876)
  - 41329: stop senseless negotiation [#12938](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12938)
  - 41658: Fix cronjob controller panic on status update failure [#13005](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/13005)
  - :41034: use instance's Name to attach gce disk [#12835](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12835)
  - <carry>: Change docker security opt separator to be compatible with 1.11+ [#12831](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12831)
  - <carry>: kubelet: change image-gc-high-threshold below docker dm.min_free_space [#12762](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12762)
  - <drop>: Workaround etcd310 / gprc version conflict with CRI [#12600](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12600)
  - <drop>: request logs when attaching to a container [#12648](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12648)

### Features

#### Template refinements

The OpenShift 1.5 release added a few new features for templates, including the ability to have integer, boolean, array, or map inputs (using the `${{PARAMETER}}` syntax). This alpha also allows templates to span namespaces if you parameterize the `namespace` field of your objects. Previously, all namespace fields were stripped, but a template object with a namespace that references a parameter will now be filled in, allowing you to instantiate cluster scoped resources that refer to a named resource in the template. `oc process --local` has been added to allow you to locally transform a template for use with a regular Kubernetes server - the transformation is performed on the client instead of requesting the server do the transformation.
- templates: Allow namespace specification via parameter in templates [#12918](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12918)
- templates: Allow templates to be processed locally with `--local` [#12996](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12996)

#### Ingress objects in the HAProxy router (tech preview)

The HAProxy router can be configured to expose Kubernetes Ingress objects. This feature is still under development and may change as more security protections are put into place. Not all features supported by Routes are available, including some advanced annotations.
- router: Support Ingress resources with the HAProxy router (tech preview) [#12416](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12416)
- router: Allow restricting Ingress objects from changing their hostname values [#12653](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12653)
- router: Fix Ingress compatibility with f5 [#12843](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12843)

#### Multicast and NetworkPolicy support for OpenShift SDN (tech preview)

Multicast and NetworkPolicy support are now available in OpenShift SDN for testing. Please see the documentation for more info on how to enable them.
- sdn: Implement NetworkPolicies with PodSelectors [#12448](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12448)
- sdn: Support multicast [#12494](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12494)
- sdn: Filter disallowed outbound multicast [#12650](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12650)
- sdn: Allow multicast for VNID 0 [#12839](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12839)
- sdn: Fixed the multicast CIDR (was 224.0.0.0/3 not /4) [#12852](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12852)

#### Node bootstrap (tech preview)

For the last several releases Kubernetes and OpenShift have been preparing to allow nodes to "self-register" in cloud environments where nodes can be spun up or down dynamically. In the v1.5.0 release the new experimental `--bootstrap` flag is available on nodes and will have the node request a client certificate from the master, then request a serving certificate, then download its node configuration from a config map. Cloud VM images can be "baked" with an account capable of self registration and the new `oc adm certificate approve` command can be used to approve the client and serving certificate requests.

This feature is still experimental and may change in future releases.
- cluster: Support a simple bootstrap mode for nodes in preparation for self-join [#9547](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/9547)

#### Basic monitoring

`oc cluster up` now installs a Prometheus and Heapster template to the `kube-system` namespace - as an administrator you can switch to that namespace and easily install them for monitoring your cluster.

Prometheus can monitor your nodes, apiserver, and services labelled with the appropriate annotations and record metrics or fire alerts. Launch and expose Prometheus with:

```
$ oc project kube-system
$ oc new-app prometheus
$ oc expose svc/prometheus
```

See the Prometheus website for more info.

To use a standalone Heapster instance with no historical metrics, run:

```
$ oc project kube-system
$ oc new-app heapster-standalone
```

Autoscaling should now be enabled for your cluster. This is useful for smaller clusters where you don't need historical data as provided by Hawkular.
- clusterup: Install Prometheus and Heapster templates to the `kube-system` namespace on cluster up [#12844](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12844)
- examples: Add a standalone Heapster example [#12812](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12812)
- examples: Add a Prometheus example [#12793](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12793)

#### Debugging the masters

In order to make it easier to capture profiles and other debug information about a running cluster, the `/debug/pprof` endpoints are 
exposed on apiservers, controllers, and nodes, but protected via a new `cluster-debugger` role.  Since the debug endpoint can extract sensitive information from the cluster, you should only give that role to trusted actors.

```
# Retrieve and process a heap dump from the master as a cluster-debugger
$ oc get --raw /debug/pprof/heap > /tmp/heap
$ go tool pprof PATH_TO_OPENSHIFT_BINARY /tmp/heap

# Capture a 30s CPU profile from the master as a cluster-debugger
$ oc get --raw /debug/pprof/profile > /tmp/cpuprofile
$ go tool pprof PATH_TO_OPENSHIFT_BINARY /tmp/cpuprofile
```
- admin: Add a new cluster-debugger role and enable debugging on masters [#12895](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12895)
- admin: Allow controller to be debugged using OpenShift credentials [#12907](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12907)

#### Other Features
- builds: Cancel binary builds if they hang [#12484](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12484)
- builds: Record built image digest in the build status [#12407](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12407)
- cli: Adding wildcardpolicy flag to `oc create route` and a column for the wildcardpolicy to `oc get route' [#12713](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12713)
- cli: Improve namespace and resource completions [#12630](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12630)
- deploy: Add support for `dc --dry-run` to rollout undo [#12729](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12729)
- dns: Allow nodes to be configured to start local DNS and bind to alternate addresses and ports [#12805](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12805)
- ipfailover: Allow multiple ipfailover configs on same node [#12472](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12472)
- registry: Add audit log [#12586](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12586)
- router: Allow routes to claim non-overlapping hosts (+ paths) and wildcards across namespace boundaries [#12441](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12441)
- security: Add descriptions to roles to better explain their purpose. [#11328](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11328)
- security: Add headers that provide extra security protection in browsers [#12521](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12521)
- server: By default, use protobuf to store server resources [#11971](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11971)
- storage: Enable Azure dynamic provisioner [#12756](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12756)
- web: Let users pause rollouts when editing deployment configs [#1129](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1129)
- web: Support volume mount subpaths and read-only flag [#1108](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1108)
- web: Improve searches for projects on create from URL page [#1145](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1145)
- web: Add Stateful Sets to monitoring page [#1163](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1163)
- web: Add namespace picker to service account tab on membership page [#1213](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1213)

name: v1.4.1
body:
This is a patch release of OpenShift Origin.

## Backwards Compatibility
- As a result of fixing [#12606](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12606), any users who have logged in since upgrading to v1.4.0 will need to log in again and recreate their login information.  Old user identity information from before the v1.4.0 upgrade will still exist in etcd and can be overwritten if necessary.

## Changes

[v1.4.1](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v1.4.1) (2017-01-24) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v1.4.0...v1.4.1)

### Bugs
- storage: Restore correct etcd pathsfor user identities and network egress policies [#12606](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12606)
- cluster: Ensure Windows systems can properly upload config files for `oc cluster up` [#12634](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12634)

## Release SHA256 Checksums


name: v1.5.0-alpha.2
body:
This is the second alpha release of OpenShift Origin v1.5.0.

## API Changes
- Images
  - `dockerImageConfig` and `dockerImageManifest` are no longer available via the `ImageStreamTag` and `ImageStreamImage` resources - they must be retrieved via the registry API [#12004](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12004)
- Policy
  - Label selectors were not honored when LISTing `clusterroles` [#12461](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12461)

## Component updates
- Updated to Kubernetes [1.5.2 + patches](https://github.com/openshift/kubernetes/commits/7b976c0f2b4d383d8da9b6416f4224daae17b1d2)
  - 32000: Update node status instead of node in kubelet
    [#10790](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/10790)
- Docker registry
  - 2140: Add 'ca-central-1' region for registry S3 storage driver [#12451](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12451)

## Features

[Roadmap for the v1.5 release](https://ci.openshift.redhat.com/releases_overview.html#3.5)

[v1.5.0-alpha.2](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v1.5.0-alpha.2) (2017-01-18) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v1.5.0-alpha.1...v1.5.0-alpha.2)

### Improvements to `oc cluster up`

`oc cluster up` now allows HTTP proxies to be configured on the started cluster for environments which require them, and will now also create a set of persistent volumes by default for use with applications to make it easier to test those that have stateful storage.
- cluster: Support HTTP and HTTPS proxies via environment variables when running `oc cluster up` [#12483](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12483)
- cluster: Add persistent volumes on startup [#12456](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12456)

### Web console improvements

[All web console changes](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/compare/ac02e04d55d69d23c2f4b701bca729d00dd2dfd8...5cb015108589cb3e9bbabe953ce86275c5a3a082)
- Improve suggested Jenkinsfile examples for readability and clarity [#1074](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1074)
- Making placement of actions menu consistent across pages [#1130](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1130)
- Display custom metrics for pods if they are available. [#1109](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1109)
- Create storage form improvements [#1133](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1133)
- Allow editing of build hooks on build configuration page [#680](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/680)
- Add StatefulSets browse page [#1088](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1088)
- Show post commit hooks for builds and build configs [#1139](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1139)

## Bugs
- admin: The `manage-node` command should avoid unnecessary conflicts by using `PATCH` to mark nodes unschedulable [#12486](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12486)
- cli: Only set the `TERM` variable if `oc rsh` is running /bin/sh [#12386](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12386)
- cli: Policy commands should print information about what was changed [#12324](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12324)
- console: Truncate long event messages to 1000 characters [#1082](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1082)
- console: Use `metadata.name` as secondary sort for projects [#1081](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1081)
- console: Let users specify HTTPS when editing health checks [#1087](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1087)
- console: Fix editing existing commands [#1089](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1089)
- console: Fix duplicate build messages on overview [#1092](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1092)
- console: Fix bug displaying read-only build config env vars [#1107](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1107)
- console: Respect limit ranges on create storage page [#1134](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1134)
- console: Prevent mobile table td collapsing issue Fixes https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/issues/1128 [#1131](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1131)
- console: Collapse pending pipelines on overview [#1126](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1126)
- egress: The egress router should not set a route if the gateway and destination addresses are the same [#12460](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12460)
- ipfailover: User check script should override default check script [#12509](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12509)
- newapp: Add golang source detector for new-app [#12485](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12485)
- newapp: Support passing environment variables to the build via `oc new-app` [#12455](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12455)
- performance: Switch image quota to shared informers [#12088](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12088)
- router: Add more information to the HAProxy 503 page to assist new users [#12409](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12409)
- servingcerts: Add service UID as x509 extension to service server certs [#12413](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12413)

## Release SHA256 Checksums

```
d87d37da3be54035f5ca88a0529e830884922f2b9629f677b249cb5dd92d9dba  openshift-origin-client-tools-v1.5.0-alpha.2-e4b43ee-linux-64bit.tar.gz
875a73563d4a9332a2ae4767c5840e73d3ec3145daf668a01c7e8f245058ddef  openshift-origin-client-tools-v1.5.0-alpha.2-e4b43ee-mac.zip
c825916e8277693b2c4fc3bfd7d238e2993fb1879160a2a7172b2e9ada52ecda  openshift-origin-client-tools-v1.5.0-alpha.2-e4b43ee-windows.zip
2cc31e72c662efa310b13d19febe9ac1a159280b584d24105af2abd5d419f5f6  openshift-origin-server-v1.5.0-alpha.2-e4b43ee-linux-64bit.tar.gz
```

name: v1.4.0
body:
# PLEASE UPGRADE to [v1.4.1](https://github.com/openshift/origin/releases/v1.4.1) instead of v1.4.0

A critical problem with v1.4.0 has been identified where user identity information is read from a different location in etcd compared to v1.3.x.   Upgraded clusters will not correlated logged in users correctly.  No data is lost, however any new users created on 1.4 will not be accessible after the fix is delivered in v1.4.1.

https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12606

--------

This is the official release of OpenShift v1.4.0.

## Changes

[Features included in the 1.4 release](https://ci.openshift.redhat.com/releases_overview.html#3.4)

[v1.4.0](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v1.4.0) (2017-01-18) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v1.3.0...v1.4.0)

### Component Updates
- Kubernetes
  - 35013: Extend list of known regions for AWS to include us-east-2 [#12256](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12256)
  - 36812: Some ScheduledJobs and Jobs were not created with unique enough names [#12432](https://github.com/openshift/origin/issues/12432)
  - 39493: Prevent a panic from the kubelet when performing some volume type checks [#12411](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12411)
- Docker registry
  - 2140: Add 'ca-central-1' region for registry S3 storage driver [#12470](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12470)

### Bugs
- Prevent a race condition where image pulls fail from the registry when a registry also has pull through enabled [#12396](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12396)
- Prevent the SDN from needlessly updating the node IP address if the order of IPs reported by the node changes [#12388](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12388)
- Ensure the volume attach/detach controller will not panic if it needs to report an error [#12263](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12263)

## SHA256 Checksums

```
99404b7b0bc4f6ee2f6af617872060343bd17b5b58bb44567afae5b93e20b000  openshift-origin-client-tools-v1.4.0-208f053-linux-64bit.tar.gz
8a9582410a5e24b6e317c34a6584a642f5bdaca36bba8bf9ef5ca61f1f1f27a7  openshift-origin-client-tools-v1.4.0-208f053-mac.zip
bc8b48bec09fd83397f76f27672af6fd9d02430193d7ef25267305b1d2ddcdb4  openshift-origin-client-tools-v1.4.0-208f053-windows.zip

```

name: v1.5.0-alpha.1
body:
This is a feature development release leading up to v1.5.0.  It is immediately prior to rebasing onto Kubernetes 1.5.

## Changes

[v1.5.0-alpha.1](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v1.5.0-alpha.1) (2017-01-24) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v1.5.0-alpha.0...v1.5.0-alpha.1)


## API

- image: Report creationTimestamp from the image in ImageStreamImage [\#12052](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12052)
- build: Report failure reasons with the build [\#10817](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/10817)
- deployments: Respect the imagePullPolicy of the deployment when running lifecycle hooks [\#12080](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12080)
- routes: Make insecureEdgeTerminationPolicy work with all types of secure routes [\#11953](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11953)

### Features

- cli: Support HTTP URLs in oc start-build --from-file [\#11811](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11811)
- cli: Support go template and jsonpath output for `oc process` [\#12230](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12230)
- cli: Support reading environment variables and parameters from files for new-app, new-build, and process [\#12164](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12164)
- ipfailover: The failover daemon check and notify scripts can now be customized [\#11644](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11644)
- newapp: Set env vars on oc new-app of template [\#12048](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12048)
- router: Add option to use PROXY protocol [\#12271](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12271)
- router: Allow route balancing algorithm to be configured and backend cookies to be disabled [\#11984](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11984)
- security: Allow administrator to limit which users can invite others to join their projects to prevent abuse [\#11743](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11743)
- web: Show environment variables coming from the builder image in the Environment tab [\#889](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/889)
- web: Improve descriptions for quota scopes [\#887](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/887)
- web: Show duration for completed pods [\#909](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/909)
- web: Add link to check server connection to error page for api discovery [\#907](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/907)
- web: Add ability to copy commands in CLI tools page [\#871](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/871)
- web: Let users remove volumes [\#891](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/891)
- web: Add volume name validation when attaching PVCs [\#920](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/920)
- web: Display keys and paths when set for secret volumes [\#927](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/927)
- web: Add in-context Jenkinsfile help [\#947](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/947)
- web: Create new config maps and secrets when adding config files [\#950](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/950)
- web: Show a "Start Pipeline" button on overview [\#958](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/958)
- web: Improve display of secrets [\#963](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/963)
- web: Let users define labels when creating routes [\#985](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/985)
- web: Show build status message when it exists [\#989](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/989)
- web: Support "Run on OpenShift" links [\#884](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/884)
- web: Add build failure reasons to monitoring and overview pages [\#996](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/996)
- web: Let users save logs [\#1040](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1040)
- web: Improve the route form [\#1068](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1068)


### Bugs

- auth: Redirect to server root if login flow is started with no destination [\#11961](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11961)
- builds: Fail new builds that can't start a build pod because it already exists [\#12057](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12057)
- builds: Wait for first build to start before showing builds to reduce timeouts [\#12163](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12163)
- cli: Add namespace selector field to cluster resource quota describe output [\#12292](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12292)
- cli: Deleted secrets should be able to be unlinked from a service account [\#11868](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11868)
- cli: Deprecate process -v/--value in favor of -p/--param [\#12001](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12001)
- cli: Don't error on login if the user can't list projects [\#12008](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12008)
- cli: Don't include display name when showing the "short" project name [\#12274](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12274)
- cli: Ensure login, project, and discovery work against an RBAC-enabled Kubernetes cluster [\#11340](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11340)
- cli: Ensure newer builds show up first in `oc status` [\#12179](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12179)
- cli: Show ready pods next to deployments in `oc status` [\#11291](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11291)
- cli: Suggest `oadm drain` instead of `oadm manage-node drain` [\#12226](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12226)
- cluster: Ensure /sys/devices/virtual/net r/w for kubelet under oc cluster up [\#12138](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12138)
- cluster: Tolerate docker attach races when starting a cluster [\#12223](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12223)
- cluster: Use default cert dir for oc cluster up client if DOCKER_TLS_VERIFY is set [\#12035](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12035)
- clusterquota: Reconcile deleted namespaces out of cluster quota status [\#12123](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12123)
- deployments: Increase default Recreate deployment timeout to ten minutes [\#12259](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12259)
- deployments: Reduce the number of times deployments are processed unnecessarily to improve performance [\#11805](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11805)
- deployments: Wait for old pods to terminate before proceeding to Recreate [\#11917](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11917)
- diagnostics: add shell prompt to commands in msgs [\#11295](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11295)
- examples: Add advanced pipeline examples [\#12177](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12177)
- images: Fix tag sorting according to semantic versioning rules [\#9600](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/9600)
- jenkins: Give Jenkins a longer livenessProbe delay to prevent it being killed prematurely [\#12134](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12134)
- ldap: Compare object DN to structured baseDN [\#12105](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12105)
- newapp: Appropriately warn/error on circular build dependencies [\#12104](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12104)
- newapp: Don't print internal error when a docker registry is unreachable [\#12269](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12269)
- newapp: Fix a bug with hidden image stream tags when no tag is specified [\#12185](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12185)
- newapp: Hide image stream tags that have the "hidden" annotation [\#12100](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12100)
- newapp: Support csproj files for identifying .NET Core projects [\#11896](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11896)
- newapp: fix priority of Jenkinsfile, Dockerfile, source when strategy unspecified [\#11982](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11982)
- registry: Ensure all download references are valid before allowing an image blob to be accessed [\#12182](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12182)
- router: Allow router to bind ports only when ready [\#11768](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11768)
- router: Minimize reloads performed during startup and filtering [\#12199](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12199)
- sdn: Ensure that the correct node IP is reported, even if the order of NICs reported for the host changes [\#12107](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12107)
- sdn: Fix a multiple-pointers-to-single-loop-variable bug in EgressNetworkPolicy [\#12045](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12045)
- sdn: Validate if the openshift master is running with mutitenant network plugin [\#11880](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11880)
- sdn: garbage-collect dead containers to recover IPAM leases [\#11964](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11964)
- server: Provide a better initial seed for math/rand on server start [\#12200](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12200)
- servicecerts: Regenerate service serving certs when configuration changes [\#12050](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/12050)
- web: Prevent filters from appearing twice on config maps page [\#913](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/913)
- web: Add warning that BC has been deleted [\#916](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/916)
- web: Don't show image name multiple times when reused in a template [\#921](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/921)
- web: Link to image stream tags in the same namespace from the build config [\#922](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/922)
- web: Don't show Start Build if build config no longer exists [\#923](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/923)
- web: Better handling of metrics errors [\#930](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/930)
- web: Show "Start Pipeline" instead of "Start Build" for pipeline strategy [\#938](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/938)
- web: Change "View History" to "View Pipeline Runs" [\#940](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/940)
- web: Show Jenkinsfile as the last field on the build config page [\#951](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/951)
- web: Improve guidance when there are no pipelines to show [\#953](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/953)
- web: Check permissions before showing editor pages [\#956](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/956)
- web: Point to Jenkinsfile when no pipeline builds have run [\#957](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/957)
- web: Disable the Create button when Configuration File field didn't pass the validation check [\#974](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/974)
- web: Don't show hidden image stream tags in the catalog [\#975](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/975)
- web: Show correct image stream name on deploy image [\#976](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/976)
- web: Warn when Git URL is not an absolute URL [\#977](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/977)
- web: Make console development mode build/run on an openshift cluster [\#961](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/961)
- web: Fix URL validation in build config editor [\#980](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/980)
- web: Adjust metrics display for pods [\#983](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/983)
- web: Display Lifecycle hooks on the deployment config browse page [\#966](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/966)
- web: If there is only 1 pod, navigate directly to it from the donut [\#999](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/999)
- web: Adding learn more links to primary and secondary pages [\#998](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/998)
- web: Show the container command and args in the detailed pod template [\#1000](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1000)
- web: Creating from some template files was broken [\#1007](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1007)
- web: Make "Show system roles" checkbox label clickable [\#965](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/965)
- web: Label value validation was broken [\#1019](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1019)
- web: Remove nesting limitation from json to yaml parsing [\#1020](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1020)
- web: Preserve line breaks in project descriptions [\#1017](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1017)
- web: Show CPU usage as cores rather than millicores [\#1022](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1022)
- web: Show build reason consistently when the build is in any phase except Cancelled [\#1028](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1028)
- web: Show large memory values in GiB on the overview [\#1025](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1025)
- web: Fix next steps always redirecting to the overview [\#1033](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1033)
- web: Don't show negative durations, they are always due to client clock skew [\#1034](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1034)
- web: Fixes "wobble" or "jitter" of spinning .status-icons [\#1016](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1016)
- web: Add learn more link to create storage page [\#1036](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1036)
- web: Make deployment and build config pages more consistent [\#1032](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1032)
- web: Show help about compute units [\#1027](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1027)
- web: Prompt error message when create secret with invalid email [\#1030](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1030)
- web: Improving display of <status-icon>s [\#1035](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1035)
- web: Add link to deployment and dc from pod page [\#1041](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1041)
- web: Don't show debug pod link for image pull errors [\#1047](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1047)
- web: Improve service traffic table on mobile [\#1042](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1042)
- web: Make tabs work with one tap on iOS [\#1050](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1050)
- web: Show a slider to select service weights [\#1053](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1053)
- web: Fix for overlapping tiles with long image names that aren't truncating [\#1058](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1058)
- web: Improve Git URL error messages [\#1059](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1059)
- web: Improve accessibility -> move ng-repeat to tr tags [\#1045](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1045)
- web: Fix builds not showing up in builds table [\#1067](https://github.com/openshift/origin-web-console/pull/1067)

name: v1.4.0-alpha.1
body:
This is the final alpha for Origin 1.4.

## Backwards Compatibility

## Features

[Release roadmap](https://ci.openshift.redhat.com/releases_overview.html#3.4)
[v1.4.0-alpha.1](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v1.4.0-alpha.1) (2016-11-03)
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v1.4.0-alpha.0...v1.4.0-alpha.1)

## API Changes and backwards compatibility notes
- PATCH is allowed in CORS requests [#11700](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11700)
- Authorization checks like SubjectAccessReview may now be performed on non-existent namespaces [#11321](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11321)
- Webhooks that are in error now return a JSON status body with their response with extended information about the failure [#11077](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11077)
- The permissions required to proxy a node have changed [#11228](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11228)
- Deployment behavior with automatic=false has changed in 1.4 [#11223](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11223)
- Remove updatePercent from deployments [#11090](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11090)
- The CLI has removed support for passing comma-separated template parameters through --param/--value - the flag must be specified multiple times to pass multiple parameters [#11539](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11539)

## Upstream

Update Kubernetes to [v1.4.0 + patches](https://github.com/openshift/kubernetes/commits/776c994514145ec6bea3ea2b8805b3c705703dff)
- 1.4.x Cherry picks [#11709](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11709)
- 35285: Remove stale volumes if endpoint/svc creation fails. [#11722](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11722)
- 35082: Wait for all pods to be running before checking PDB status [#11714](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11714)
- 33014: Report the image digest in pod status when available [#11674](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11674)
- 34434: Print valid json/yaml output in `kubectl set image` [#11664](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11664)
- 34298: Fix potential panic in namespace controller [#11632](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11632)
- 30836: Fix dynamic provisioning for vSphere [#11598](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11598)
- 35608: Update PodAntiAffinity to ignore calls to subresources [#11578](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11578)
- 34997: Fix kube vsphere.kerneltime [#11574](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11574)
- 35420: Remove Job also from .status.active for Replace strategy [#11523](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11523)
- 32593: Audit test fails to take into account timezone [#11505](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11505)
- 31607: Add kubectl describe storageclass [#11481](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11481)
- 30145: Add PVC storage to Limit Range [#11396](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11396)
- 32084: Do not allow creation of GCE PDs in unmanaged zones [#11369](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11369)
- 32077: Do not report warning event when an unknown provisioner is requested [#11368](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11368)
- 32662: Change the default volume type of GlusterFS provisioner [#11367](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11367)
- 35206: Update default run func for cmds containing sub-commands [#11362](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11362)
- 27714: Send recycle events from pod to pv. [#11259](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11259)
- 34763: Log warning on invalid --output-version [#11239](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11239)
- 34028: Add --dry-run option to `kubectl create` sub-commands [#11238](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11238)
- 33958: Add global timeout flag [#11104](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11104)
- 34010: Match GroupVersionKind against specific version [#11286](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11286)
- 34020: Allow empty annotation values [#11210](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11210)
- 33464: Fix cache expiration check [#11088](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11088)
- 33319: Add nodeport option when creating NodePort service [#11059](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11059)

## Features
- sysctl support in runtime and via SecurityConstraintContexts [#11195](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11195)
- Rules review endpoint for other users [#11172](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11172)
- SCC check API: REST [#11075](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11075)
- Support non-string template parameter substitution [#11421](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11421)
- Enable jenkins autoprovisioning [#11065](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11065)
- Fix OAuth redirect ref in Jenkins service account [#11681](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11681)
- F5 should be able to integrate into the openshift-sdn directly [#11181](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11181)
- Provide vxlan integration options to the router cmd line [#11677](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11677)
- Fix a problem with F5 node watches [#11742](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11742)
- Verify all certificates used by the router [#11218](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11218)
- Change router to use a certificate list/map file for stronger validation of user certificates [#11217](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11217)
- Allow wildcards to be supported in routers [#11550](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11550)
- Allow compression to optionally be enabled for all routes [#11469](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11469)
- Convert openshift-sdn to a CNI plugin [#11082](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11082)
- network: Fix join/isolate project network under CNI [#11679](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11679)
- sdn: miscellaneous fixes after the CNI merge [#11613](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11613)
- network: fix single-tenant pod setup and leave docker0 around [#11588](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11588)
- Make rollout and rollback more in line with upstream Kubernetes in the CLI [#11655](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11655)
- oc: add -o revision in rollout latest [#11357](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11357)
- oc: deprecate 'deploy --latest' in favor of 'rollout latest --again' [#11287](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11287)
- Convey conditions about deployments, replication controllers, deployment configs, and replica sets on the API objects for better user comprehension of problems [#11214](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11214)
- deploy: Set condition reason correctly for new RCs [#11609](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11609)
- deploy: add conditions when creating replication controllers [#11412](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11412)
- Add Ceph RBD and Gluster provisioners [#11460](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11460)
- Support specifying StorageClass while creating volumes with `oc set volume` [#11451](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11451)
- Add 'oc set resources' [#11384](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11384)
- Admins can now default build pod annotations and node selectors [#11380](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11380)
- Add option to install logging components to `oc cluster up` [#11343](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11343)
- Add `oc cluster status` for helpful info about a recent cluster [#11171](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11171)
- Add option to `oc whoami` to print the server url [#11180](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11180)
- Switch nodes to enable pods-per-core as the primary constraint, and increase max pods [#11174](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11174)

### Console Features

#### Managing project membership

An important feature for people that want to collaborate within the same projects, the new membership management interface lets you add and remove roles to users, groups, and service accounts within your project.

![membership](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1467629/20279874/4aaaa582-aa78-11e6-89ca-803e00ce26f9.gif)

Project administrators have access to view and modify the projects membership.  Membership management is the only difference between an admin and an editor in the default OpenShift roles.  Cluster administrators can add a description to any role to provide extra information for end users about what that role actually allows.

#### Creating and Adding Secrets for Build and Deployment Configurations

Prior to 1.4 it was very difficult to set up a build against a private git repository from the web console. Previously you had to Import YAML/JSON to create your secret and then edit your builds YAML to make it use that secret.

Now you can expand the advanced build options, create a user/password or SSH key based secret and tell the build to use that when cloning your source. Already have your secret created in that project? You can pick any of your existing ones too.

![new-app-git-secrets](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1467629/20279962/96c3bcd8-aa78-11e6-9075-3bbc0a31ad1f.gif)

While we were making private git repository connections easier to set up, we figured we should improve setting up push and pull against private image registries as well. The build configuration editor lets you set up a push or pull secret in case the image you are building from or the image stream you are pushing to is on a secure registry.  Similarly the new deployment configuration editor allows you to specify a pull secret.

#### Editor for deployment configuration strategy, hooks, and secrets

Weve had a GUI editor for build configurations for a few releases now, but now weve added one for deployment configurations too. From the new editor you can:
- Switch your deployment strategy
- Tweak advanced deployment settings like the maximum number of pods that can be unavailable during - the deployment
- Add, edit, or remove deployment lifecycle hooks
- Change the image being deployed
- Set a pull secret for the registry your image is being pulled from
- Add, edit, or remove environment variables for the pods that will be deployed

![dc-editor](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1467629/20280006/c91ed50a-aa78-11e6-91c3-6827da086d20.gif)

Many of the existing editing actions we supported still exist as separate actions, such as editing health checks, or configuring different resource limits.  If you want to make a number of changes without triggering a deployment for each change, you can now Pause your deployment, make all the changes you want, and then Resume it.  Pausing will prevent any deployment from happening no matter whether it was automatically or manually triggered.

#### Organization of Add to Project Catalog / Customizable Categories

Our existing Add to Project catalog could become quite cluttered when dealing with builder images with many versions, or lots of templates with slight differences. In the past we had focused on minimizing the number of clicks to getting you to something running, but now weve focused on helping you find what you are actually looking for.  The main catalog page now only contains high level categories Languages and Technologies and underneath those are sub-categories, such as Java or Data Stores.  Diving into one of those youll find re-designed tiles for builder images and templates.  Different versions of the same builder image now all roll-up to the same tile with the semantically latest version automatically selected.  We have also taken a hard look at all of our out of the box images and templates and focused on providing better display names, descriptions, and categorization.

![catalog-reorg](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1467629/20280055/ecee26f2-aa78-11e6-8db9-9e2c091784fe.gif)

Dont like our categories? Now you can [customize the categories](https://docs.openshift.org/latest/install_config/web_console_customization.html#configuring-catalog-categories) and subcategories as much as you want. 

#### Filtering and Sorting the Project List

We have a class of users for OpenShift that manage many projects on behalf of a larger set of developers.  To make things easier for people with a large number of projects, the project list now has a text filter on name, display name, description, and project creator.  It also allows sorting on several of these attributes.

![project-list-filter-sort](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1467629/20280143/408ab514-aa79-11e6-8f28-4d49900ed371.png)

#### Quota Warnings

User working within quota constraints had a hard time before knowing when they had run out of quota unless they went to check the Quota page.  We wanted to add some checks for the most common scenarios where we people have problems with quota.  Youll now get quota warnings:
- On the overview - this is a generic warning if anything in your quota is at its limit
- On the overview pod count visualizations - when we think you are unable to reach your scale target due to quota
- If you try to create something and we know you are out of quota for that resource
- If you try to create something and we think it will cause you to exceed quota for a resource

#### Bookmarkable Page States

Sometimes the little things can make all the difference. Have you been annoyed that you couldnt send someone straight to the log tab for a pod? Now you can! Tab selection, label filters, and several other options that change page state are now persisted to the URL throughout the console.  You can bookmark and share with others.

#### Support for new and beta Kubernetes features

Create storage using storage classes
- If your cluster admin sets up storage classes, then they will be available for you to pick from in the Create Storage page.

Deployments and ReplicaSets
- Will fit in seamlessly on the overview alongside your existing Deployment Configurations
- Will appear on the Applications -> Deployments page
- Support many of the actions we already supported for Deployment Configurations (excluding the new editor)

Roll-up of PetSet pods on the Overview
- A PetSets pods will roll up into a single card with a pod count visualization like the other controllers
- Youll be able to see metrics on the overview for the pods in the petset

## Bugs
- admin: Allow `oadm prune *` to work against a single namespace [#11249](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11249)
- admin: Make node evacuate command aware of replica set and daemon set [#11284](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11284)
- audit: Switch to use upstream audit handler [#11192](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11192)
- auth: Use custom transport for GitLab OAuth communication [#11693](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11693)
- bootstrap: Add additional warning for oc cluster up not being able to access port 8443 [#11597](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11597)
- bootstrap: Bind socat to 127.0.0.1 when using it on OS X [#11139](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11139)
- bootstrap: Display warning instead of error if ports 80/443 in use [#11600](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11600)
- bootstrap: Do not re-initialize a cluster that already has been initialized [#11146](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11146)
- bootstrap: Lack of IPv6 should not prevent `oc cluster up` from starting a container [#11219](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11219)
- bootstrap: Remove temporary files when creating a new cluster [#11157](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11157)
- builds: Allow labels to be set when building images [#11209](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11209)
- builds: Delete temporary secret data as soon as possible in builds [#11116](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11116)
- builds: If the input image cannot be found, immediately fail the build [#11398](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11398)
- cli: Add bash completion for pod name to `oc exec` [#11329](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11329)
- cli: Clean up command descriptions (1/2) [#11608](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11608)
- cli: Clean up command descriptions (2/2) [#11684](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11684)
- cli: Ensure volumes worked correctly when used with `oc apply` and strategic merge patches [#11062](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11062)
- cli: Improve `oc start-build --follow` to behave more predictably [#11119](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11119)
- cli: Improve exec and attach error messages [#11549](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11549)
- cli: Improve export for deployment configs [#11529](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11529)
- cli: Improve oc help global options hint [#11703](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11703)
- cli: Set the BASIC or SSH secret type with `oc secrets new-*` [#11222](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11222)
- cli: Support for the --local flag in `set deployment-hooks` [#11395](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11395)
- cli: Update short description for rollout [#11657](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11657)
- cli: Validate inputs to 'oc run' for better user feedback [#11635](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11635)
- cli: `oadm manage-node --list-pods` should return a single list of pods for scripting [#11216](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11216)
- cli: `oc env` should be able to return a list of items post-mutation [#11379](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11379)
- cli: `oc login` must ignore some SSL cert errors when --insecure [#11145](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11145)
- cli: `oc project` should work against a Kubernetes server directly [#11120](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11120)
- cli: fix oc whoami --show-server output [#11697](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11697)
- cloud: Initialize cloud provider in node [#11620](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11620)
- cloud: Make service controller startup failure non-fatal on unsupported platforms [#11648](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11648)
- deploy: Correct updating lastTransitionTime in deployment conditions [#11665](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11665)
- deploy: Default maxSurge/maxUnavailable separately [#11678](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11678)
- deploy: Make deployment triggers more performant with lower latency by avoiding unnecessary work [#11501](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11501)
- deploy: When instantiating a deployment, ensure it doesn't error if no changes occurred [#11500](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11500)
- diagnostics: Test more pod to pod connectivity test combinations [#11717](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11717)
- doc: Improved API docs for role bindings API [#11344](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11344)
- doc: `oc cluster up` doc update [#11624](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11624)
- extended: deployment with multiple containers using a single ICT [#11221](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11221)
- extended: move deployment fixtures in separate directory [#11212](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11212)
- images: Add the Jenkins v2 imagestreams to the default list [#11360](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11360)
- images: Adds display name to image streams, updates PostgreSQL link [#11619](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11619)
- images: Ensure multi-segment image names are properly handled on image import and tagging [#11173](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11173)
- images: Improve out-of-the-box template and image stream metadata [#11540](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11540)
- ipfailover: Allow the iptables chain that will accept multicast connections to be configured [#11327](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11327)
- jenkins: Autoprovisioning is re-enabled [#11543](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11543)
- network: Ensure that veth TX queue length is always set to non-zero to enable QoS [#11126](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11126)
- network: Fix EgressNetworkPolicy match-all-IPs special case [#11673](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11673)
- network: Fix creation of macvlan interfaces [#11663](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11663)
- network: Release subnet leases upon hostsubnet delete [#11628](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11628)
- newapp: Improve `oc new-app` output for better readability [#11220](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11220)
- newapp: Validate non-numeric EXPOSE directive when strategy wasn't specified [#11687](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11687)
- newapp: `oc new-app --search` should not require docker hub access [#11436](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11436)
- perf: Improve reliability dockercfg secret creation by using shared caches [#11394](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11394)
- perf: Use a cache of layer sizes to reduce stats calls in the registry [#11558](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11558)
- perf: Use service account informer in podsecuritypolicyreview [#11612](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11612)
- projects: Log project request failures [#11226](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11226)
- projects: Only pay attention to origin types in project lifecycle admission [#11627](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11627)
- quota: ClusterResourceQuota was reporting incorrect values [#11595](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11595)
- reliability: Enable PodDistruptionBudget [#11187](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11187)
- router: Allow http for edge teminated routes with wildcard policy. [#11760](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11760)
- security: Control who can set the owner ref field on objects [#11397](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11397)
- security: Restrict who can use custom builds by default [#11411](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11411)
- security: Test x509 intermediates correctly [#11307](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11307)
- server: Require TLS 1.2 by default for clients [#11495](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11495)
- server: Warn if no login IDPs have been configured [#11235](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11235)
- volumes: Allow pv controller to recycle pvs, watch recycler pod events [#11731](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11731)
- volumes: Ensure meta info is loaded before removing a PV [#11737](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/11737)

name: v1.3.1
body:
UPDATED: Mac client tools have been rebuilt on top of Go 1.7 to fix various issues related to the OS X Sierra update.

This is a patch release to Origin v1.3.x containing a security related fix.  All users are recommended to upgrade to v1.3.1 who are on v1.3.0.

## Bugs

[v1.3.1](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v1.3.1) (2016-08-14)
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v1.3.0...v1.3.1)
- Intermediate CA certificates were being improperly checked for authorization (CVE-2016-7075) #11308
- Tolerate caching delays when checking permissions for newly created namespaces #10932
- Properly default client rate limiting in controllers - very low values were being defaulted #10930 
- Some non-resource URLs were being denied for the cluster infrastructure roles #10933
- Annotations used in cluster resource quota were not being properly validated #10929
- `oc login` should ignore some SSL related errors when using `--insecure` #11179
- Some roles should have access to the node's `/spec` endpoint #11047 
- Fixed `oc` segfault seen in macOS Sierra (10.12) #11085

name: v1.3.0
body:
This is OpenShift Origin 1.3.0!

## Backwards Compatibility

Please see alpha.0 -> rc1 release notes for a full description of backwards compatibility changes.
- v1beta3 in storage is no longer supported - please see the release notes for a migration guide
- This is the last release that will support v1.0.0 API backwards compatibility, specifically:
  - The `Service` field `spec.portalIP` will no longer be returned in 1.4.0
  - The `Pod` field `status.hostIP` will no longer be returned in 1.4.0

## Features

[Release roadmap](https://ci.openshift.redhat.com/releases_overview.html#3.3)
[v1.3.0](https://github.com/openshift/origin/tree/v1.3.0) (2016-09-15)
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v1.2.1...v1.3.0)
[RC Changelog](https://github.com/openshift/origin/compare/v1.3.0-rc1...v1.3.0)

Blog post coming soon - please see [alpha.1](https://github.com/openshift/origin/releases/v1.3.0-alpha.1), [alpha.2](https://github.com/openshift/origin/releases/v1.3.0-alpha.2), [alpha.3](https://github.com/openshift/origin/releases/v1.3.0-alpha.3), [rc1](https://github.com/openshift/origin/releases/v1.3.0-rc1) for more!

## Bugs
- router: Properly clean up deleted routes in the router [#10855](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/10855)
- cli: `oc process` was not properly handling parameter values with `=` in them [#10880](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/10880)
- storage: Ensure the master side attach-detach function works successfully [#10892](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/10892)
- quota: Ensure that the cluster resource quota annotation selector works for long annotation values [#10896](https://github.com/openshift/origin/pull/10896)
